# HMError.Code.maximumAccessoriesOfTypeInHome

**Case**

The home already has the maximum number of accessories of the given type.

## Declaration

```swift
case maximumAccessoriesOfTypeInHome
```

## Home and room errors

- **HMError.Code.roomForHomeCannotBeInZone**: An attempt to add the room that represents the entire home to a zone.
- **HMError.Code.roomForHomeCannotBeUpdated**: An attempt to change the room that represents the entire home.
